author: jwasinger
content:
I'm studying up on the glv method for ec point multiplication.  In the kilic library, the scalar decomposition code (https://github.com/kilic/bls12-381/blob/master/glv.go#L123-L155) references Guide to Pairing Based Cryptography 6.3.2 .

does anyone have a link to a pdf of the book/chapter?

author: hectorcascos
content: Is on the website of one of the authors https://www.math.u-bordeaux.fr/~damienrobert/csi/book/book.pdf
